fields.value: Replication data for: A Dynamic State-Space Model of Coded Political Texts

publicationCitation.value: Martin Elff. 2013. "A Dynamic State-Space Model of Coded Political Texts." Political Analysis (Spring 2013) 21 (2): 217-232. article available here

files.description: Predictions about changes in parties' positions in the spaces of economic policy and of non-economic domestic policy. For each election and each party the data set contains the posterior means, posterior standard deviations, the posterior median, the posterior 2.5%, 5%, 10%, 25%, 75%, 90%, 95%, and 97.5% quantiles of the changes in the coordinates of the party's position on the axes of the respective policy spaces.
files.label: changes.tab
